Trinity/Nightlight/Windlord::

Nightlight "Grounded, if you can hear me, Trinity it's ok... she's 
with me, she..."

The femme couln't end, while Trinity  was following her, crying aloud

SHields opened and closed, let Nightlight, Grounded, Trinity and 
Windlord come in the ship.

Windlord ran towards the cr's an left Linzyx in one,. Nightlight 
arrived and left Grounded in the fourth.

Now four cr, all cr's in the ship were being used.

Trinity was crying, she felt guilty due his friend was hurt.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
> ::Grounded::
> Grounded came to when Nightlight picked him up.
> "Where...whe...where is Trinity.  I can't see, my
> optics are dead. "  He groaned. The going into stasis lock.
> airly2000@y... wrote:
> 
> > Trinity/Nighlight:
> > 
> > Trinity saw her friend fell "GROOOOOOOOUNNNDED!!!!!" the girl ran
> > towards the male, Nightlight did the same.
> > 
> > "iT'S MY FAUUUUUULTTT" cried Trinity.
> > 
> > "Trinity, help me to carry Grounded to the base"sait worried
> > Nightlight
> >

> > 
> > Nightlight took Grounded and carried him to basem (Gunthers told 
me

torso ,
